ygData.subject: RE: looking for info in Thicken Mana series
ygData.msgSnippet: I can t say myself.. My guess would be that it provides basically a mana potion that can then be drunk to add mana quickly (each higher level spell offering
ygData.messageBody:
I can't say myself.. My guess would be that it provides basically a mana
potion that can then be drunk to add mana quickly (each higher level spell
offering more mana) but I don't know..just a guess.



-----Original Message-----
From: jcent@... [mailto:jcent@...]
Sent: Monday, October 04, 1999 11:53 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] looking for info in Thicken Mana series


From: jcent@...


has anyone used this line of spells yet? where are the vials found?

What is the purpose of the end-product? a vial of viscous mana is used
for....?? Item enchantments? how? is this skill/trade even implemented
yet?

thanks.

Fistlebane
